org.apache.flink.api.common.accumulators

Interface Accumulator<V,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Type of values that are added to the accumulator
    R - Type of the accumulator result as it will be reported to the client
    All Superinterfaces:
    IOReadableWritable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SimpleAccumulator<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleCounter, EmptyFieldsCountAccumulator.VectorAccumulator, Histogram, IntCounter, LongCounter

    public interface Accumulator<V,R>
extends IOReadableWritable, Serializable
    Interface for custom accumulator objects. Data are written to in a UDF and merged by the system at the end of the job. The result can be read at the end of the job from the calling client. Inspired by Hadoop/MapReduce counters.

    The type added to the accumulator might differ from the type returned. This is the case e.g. for a set-accumulator: We add single objects, but the result is a set of objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void add(V value) 
      R getLocalValue() 
      void merge(Accumulator<V,R> other)
      Used by system internally to merge the collected parts of an accumulator at the end of the job.
      void resetLocal()
      Reset the local value.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flink.core.io.IOReadableWritable

        read, write

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(V value)
        Parameters:
        value - The value to add to the accumulator object

      • getLocalValue

        R getLocalValue()
        Returns:
        local The local value from the current UDF context

      • resetLocal

        void resetLocal()
        Reset the local value. This only affects the current UDF context.

      • merge

        void merge(Accumulator<V,R> other)
        Used by system internally to merge the collected parts of an accumulator at the end of the job.
        Parameters:
        other - Reference to accumulator to merge in.
